org.drip.math.spline

Class SpanInterpolator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.math.algodiff.ObjectiveFunction
      • org.drip.math.spline.SpanInterpolator

  • public class SpanInterpolator
extends ObjectiveFunction
    This class implements the basis spline interpolator. It calibrates across spline segments.
